product.title: LEHOZIHEQ Auto Hair Curler, Automatic Curling Iron Wand with 4 Temperatures & 3 Timers & LCD Display, Curling Iron with 1" Large Rotating Barrel, Dual Voltage Auto Shut-Off Spin Iron for Hair Styling
product.description:
✮✮ Hello (✿◠‿◠) Dear Customer, Welcome to LEHOZIHEQ Store

We Will Give Every Customer The Best Service ✮✮

✅✅ We cares about each customer's true feelings and considers them the key to success.

✅✅ According to the suggestions of the customers, always better with the products.

✅✅ Your 100% satisfaction is our pursuit !!!

LEHOZIHEQ Auto Hair Curler, Automatic Curling Iron Wand with 4 Temperatures & 3 Timers & LCD Display, Curling Iron with 1" Large Rotating Barrel, Dual Voltage Auto Shut-Off Spin Iron for Hair Styling

Features:

Easy Operation: This double ceramic curling iron offers the in heat and damage protection and frizz control.

Fast heating - The use of powerful ceramic heaters inside the curler with a power of 45 W allows you to quickly heat the device to a temperature of up to 210 °C. turning on the curler, you need to wait about 30 seconds to curl your hair. Save your time for visits to the beautician or waiting for heating the old curling iron. Time saving: the curling brush heats up immediately, you can arrange your hair in even 15 minutes. The even heating of the curling iron increases the efficiency of curling your hair, giving you beautiful curls or waves in a few moments without unnecessary visits to the hairdressing salon.

Protects the hair - The surface of the curler has been covered with ceramic coating, which makes your hair safer on with high temperatures. The insulation of the curler core makes it anti-, and its use does not produce unpleasant electricity.

 Absolutely safe to hair - refined by a special ceramic glazes and the-technology won’t harm the hair, ceramic technology provides high heat while protecting hair. You can be the barber too with our hair curling iron curling wands; unique design, arbitrary, and let your hair more and elegant Product Description:

【Instructions for use】:

1. Voltage: 110-220V 50Hz 45W.

2. Constant temperature 190℃

3. 360°C rotatable wire, no knots, 2 meters long.

4. Curl 19mm

【Specific operation】:

1. Dry the hair until 8-90% dry before using the hair iron.

2. Clip hair piece

3. Clamp the hair with the clip of the curling iron and then roll it up to the position you think is appropriate. Leave on for about half a minute. Slowly put it down to cool, and blow it with cold to set it.

【Precautions】:

1. Do not cover the curling iron with objects, so as not to damage the internal circuit due to excessive temperature

2. Do not put it on flammables and items that are not to high temperature during use

3. Do not take it into the bathroom for use, or place it in water or any liquid to avoid electric shock or damage to the machine.

4. The curling iron should keep a certain safe distance from the skin to avoid overheating and scalding

5. Unplug the power plug use, and store it in a dry place . Do not wrap the power cord around the machine.

LEHOZIHEQ Auto Hair Curler, Automatic Curling Iron Wand with 4 Temperatures & 3 Timers & LCD Display, Curling Iron with 1" Large Rotating Barrel, Dual Voltage Auto Shut-Off Spin Iron for Hair Styling

Features:

Easy Operation: This double ceramic curling iron offers the in heat and damage protection and frizz control.

Fast heating - The use of powerful ceramic heaters inside the curler with a power of 45 W allows you to quickly heat the device to a temperature of up to 210 °C. turning on the curler, you need to wait about 30 seconds to curl your hair. Save your time for visits to the beautician or waiting for heating the old curling iron. Time saving: the curling brush heats up immediately, you can arrange your hair in even 15 minutes. The even heating of the curling iron increases the efficiency of curling your hair, giving you beautiful curls or waves in a few moments without unnecessary visits to the hairdressing salon.

Protects the hair - The surface of the curler has been covered with ceramic coating, which makes your hair safer on with high temperatures. The insulation of the curler core makes it anti-, and its use does not produce unpleasant electricity.

 Absolutely safe to hair - refined by a special ceramic glazes and the-technology won’t harm the hair, ceramic technology provides high heat while protecting hair. You can be the barber too with our hair curling iron curling wands; unique design, arbitrary, and let your hair more and elegant Product Description:

【Instructions for use】:

1. Voltage: 110-220V 50Hz 45W.

2. Constant temperature 190℃

3. 360°C rotatable wire, no knots, 2 meters long.

4. Curl 19mm

【Specific operation】:

1. Dry the hair until 8-90% dry before using the hair iron.

2. Clip hair piece

3. Clamp the hair with the clip of the curling iron and then roll it up to the position you think is appropriate. Leave on for about half a minute. Slowly put it down to cool, and blow it with cold to set it.

【Precautions】:

1. Do not cover the curling iron with objects, so as not to damage the internal circuit due to excessive temperature

2. Do not put it on flammables and items that are not to high temperature during use

3. Do not take it into the bathroom for use, or place it in water or any liquid to avoid electric shock or damage to the machine.

4. The curling iron should keep a certain safe distance from the skin to avoid overheating and scalding

5. Unplug the power plug use, and store it in a dry place . Do not wrap the power cord around the machine. * 【TIME SAVING & NO SKILL NEED】This auto hair curler adopts a one-button curling design to easily creates beautiful, long-lasting curls in an instant! All you need to do is press and hold the button, wait for the beeps to be over, curling hair has never been so effortless! Upgraded 1-inch larger barrel and U-shaped slot of hair curlers help you to curl more hair, saving you time.
 * 【4 TEMPERATURE & 3 TIMING SETTINGS】The automatic hair curler focuses on delivering personalized experience to customers. The temperature varies from 320℉ to 430℉ to fit different hair types. 8s/12s/16s auto curling timers allows you to select a suitable time to create a variety of hairstyle from waves to tight curls, enjoy the endless styling possibilities.
 * 【ANTI-TANGLED DESIGN & LCD Display】This auto curling iron is built in a smart magnetic induction motor, which will stop work to prevent the hair from being tangled and pulled if it curls too much hair or works incorrectly. ❤If your hair does get stuck, simply spin the curling dial in the opposite direction to release the hair. LCD Display helps you easily set and view the desired temperature.
 * 【ANTI-SCALDING & CERAMIC IRON TECHNOLOGY】Compared with traditional curling iron or curling wand, our hair curler with double-layered heat protection cover is designed to prevent burning on your fingers or face. The auto hair curler is made of professional ceramic tourmaline, it can produce a potent mass of negative ions to seal moisture into your hair and protects cuticle. This will keep your hair healthy and smooth with shiny curls lasting all day long.
 * 【AUTO SHUT-OFF & IDEAL GIFTS】Automatically shut down in 30mins standby, Dual Voltage (100V-240V) for worldwide use, 2.5m 360°swivel cord, bid farewell to the dead battery! This curling wand is also an ideal gift for women/beloves. Buy with utmost confidence. If for any reason you aren’t happy with this auto hair curler, simply contact us for a satisfied solution.
